item.title: 杰富瑞伍德因量子计算威胁抛售比特币
item.description: 量子计算这一曾经遥不可及的威胁，已促使一位备受瞩目的市场策略师放弃比特币，这凸显出人们对该加密货币安全性的疑虑正逐渐渗透到主流投资组合的考量中。【原文：The once-distant threat of quantum computing has prompted one of the most closely followed market strategists to walk away from Bitcoin, underscoring how doubts over the token’s security are creeping into mainstream portfolio thinking.】

item.title: 日本央行宣布将于下周开始出售所持ETF持仓
item.description: 日本央行表示，将于周一开始出售其持有的交易所交易基金，按当前计划的进度推进，这项计划可能需要一个多世纪才能完成。【原文：The Bank of Japan said it will start selling its holdings of exchange-traded funds on Monday, a project that may take more than a century if it proceeds at the currently planned pace.】

item.title: 保时捷销量创16年来最大跌幅，受中国市场疲软及车型缺口影响
item.description: 保时捷公司去年交付量下滑10%，创下自2009年全球金融危机冲击市场以来的最大跌幅，主要源于电动汽车需求疲软及中国市场萎缩。【原文：Porsche AG’s deliveries fell 10% last year, the steepest drop since 2009 when the global financial crisis roiled markets, following weak demand for electric vehicles and a slump in China.】

item.title: 即便在科技领域，欧洲仍是当下最值得关注的市场
item.description: 今年欧洲股市相对于美国股市的优异表现出现了意外转折，科技股成为引领者。【原文：European stocks’ outperformance over the US has taken a surprising turn this year, with technology names in the driving seat.】

item.description: 更多关于伊朗抗议活动与金融危机的报道【原文：Lots More on the Protests and Financial Crisis in Iran】

item.title: 加拿大称中国将在3月前降低农产品关税，贸易关系出现缓和迹象
item.description: 加拿大预计中国将在3月1日前削减其油菜籽关税，这将显著缓解两国贸易争端——该争端不仅扰乱了农产品流通，更考验着双边关系。【原文：Canada expects China to cut tariffs on its rapeseed by March 1, which would be a significant thaw in a trade rift that has disrupted crop flows and tested bilateral relations.】

item.title: 贝莱德的朱厄尔表示强劲盈利将提振欧洲股市
item.description: 贝莱德公司分析师海伦·朱厄尔表示，鉴于企业盈利前景稳健，欧洲股市创纪录的上涨行情远未结束。【原文：Europe’s record-breaking equity rally is far from over given a solid outlook for corporate earnings, according to BlackRock Inc.’s Helen Jewell.】

item.title: 德尔维基奥旗下德尔芬公司否认与裕信银行就帕斯基股份进行谈判
item.description: 亿万富豪德尔维基奥家族旗下的投资公司德尔芬有限责任公司否认正与裕信银行就出售其持有的西恩纳蒙特迪帕斯基银行17.5%股份进行谈判。【原文：Delfin Sarl, the investment firm of the billionaire Del Vecchio family, denied it’s in talks with UniCredit SpA over potentially selling its 17.5% stake in rival lender Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA.】

item.title: 莫比乌斯避开创纪录黄金，因美元反弹风险
item.description: 资深投资者马可·莫比乌斯表示，黄金在经历历史性上涨后已失去吸引力，并警告称美元可能反弹，这可能削弱贵金属价格——而当前市场普遍仍持坚定看涨态度。【原文：Veteran investor Mark Mobius said gold has become unattractive after its historic rally, warning that a potential rebound in the dollar could undercut precious metals at a time when much of the market remains firmly bullish.】

item.title: 南非延长在线博彩税征求意见截止日期
item.description: 南非因收到更多时间请求，延长了公众对拟议20%在线赌博税征求意见的截止期限。【原文：South Africa extended the deadline for public comment on a proposed 20% online-gambling tax due to requests for more time.】

item.title: 据称迪拜世界贸易中心与英富曼拟将联合活动业务上市
item.description: 迪拜世界贸易中心与英国英富曼集团正探讨将联合活动业务上市事宜，该业务预计将整合迪拜酋长国部分最具影响力的展览及会议资源。【原文：Dubai World Trade Centre and the UK’s Informa Group are exploring a listing of a joint events business that’s expected to combine some of the emirate’s most prominent exhibitions and conferences.】

item.title: 欧洲最大初创企业防务基金筹资5亿欧元
item.description: 德国投资机构数字转型资本合伙公司正筹建欧洲史上规模最大的国防初创企业专项风险投资基金，该基金目标规模达5亿欧元（约合5.8亿美元），目前已签约首批主要投资者。【原文：German investor Digital Transformation Capital Partners GmbH is on track to raise Europe’s largest-ever dedicated venture capital fund for defense startups, signing its first big backers for a fund targeting €500 million ($580 million).】

item.title: 菲律宾采取措施提振因腐败丑闻受挫的投资者信心
item.description: 菲律宾经济决策者周五在一次私人论坛上召集企业高管，向他们保证将推进改革，力图重振因政府大规模腐败丑闻而动摇的投资者信心。【原文：Philippine economic managers rallied business executives and assured them of reforms at a private forum on Friday, seeking to restore investor confidence shaken by a massive government corruption scandal.】

item.title: 渣打银行考虑印度卡业务部门的多种方案，因零售业务收缩
item.description: 据知情人士透露，渣打银行正对其在印度的零售信用卡业务进行评估，此举是该行重塑全球增长最快主要经济体业务布局的更广泛战略的一部分。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is reviewing its retail credit card business in India amid a wider strategy to reshape operations in the world’s fastest‑growing major economy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时100指数或将从历史高位回落
中国欧元结算额创2010年以来最大增幅 欧盟贸易繁荣推动
item.description: 去年中国企业在跨境交易中加大了欧元使用力度，以欧元结算的交易额增速创下2010年以来最高纪录。【原文：Chinese companies ramped up use of the euro in cross-border transactions last year, with settlements in the currency rising at the fastest pace since 2010.】

item.title: 波兰央行委员科特茨基称，波兰可能在2月就降息
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会成员卢德维克·科特茨基表示，随着持续低通胀前景改善，波兰可能在下月再次降息，幅度为25个基点。【原文：Poland may return to interest rate cuts next month with a quarter-point reduction as prospects for continued low inflation improve, according to Monetary Policy Council member Ludwik Kotecki.】

item.title: 英国统计机构考虑推迟六个月开展新就业调查
item.description: 英国国家统计局已制定应急方案，将推迟六个月启动新的劳动力市场调查，这可能导致该机构在努力恢复国家经济数据公信力的过程中遭遇进一步延误。【原文：The UK statistics agency has drawn up contingency plans to delay the launch of its new labor market survey by six months, raising the possibility of a further holdup as it battles to restore the credibility of the country’s economic data.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下Grok人工智能因性化图像遭日本审查
item.description: 日本加入了日益增多的国家行列，就埃隆·马斯克的人工智能服务Grok及其聊天机器人未经当事人同意制造和传播性化图像的行为展开调查。【原文：Japan joined the growing list of countries probing X over Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence service Grok and the chatbot’s role in creating and spreading sexualized images of people without their consent.】

item.title: 日本与意大利将提升双边关系，在关键矿产领域加强合作
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗与意大利总理乔尔吉娅·梅洛尼同意在关键矿产供应领域加强合作，并将两国关系提升至新高度。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi and Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni agreed to work together on critical mineral supply and elevate their relationship to a new level.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣警告称将采取一切必要措施支撑日元汇率
item.description: 日本财务大臣重申警告称，为应对日元近期走弱，日本政府将采取包括直接干预汇率在内的所有必要措施。【原文：Japan’s finance minister reiterated her warning that all options including direct currency intervention are available for dealing with recent weakness in the yen.】

item.title: 台湾否认美台协议损害科技产业，台积电正加速海外布局
item.description: 台湾试图淡化外界对其科技产业因美台贸易协议而遭掏空的担忧，尽管台积电等芯片制造商已在美国投入数千亿美元。【原文：Taiwan sought to downplay concerns its tech industry is being hollowed out by a US trade deal, as Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. and other chipmakers invest hundreds of billions of dollars in America.】

item.title: 马来西亚季度经济增速飙升至5.7%，逆特朗普关税而上
item.description: 马来西亚第四季度经济增速超出预期，全年增长率也因此超越官方预测。强劲的服务业和制造业表现有效抵消了美国严苛关税的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s economy expanded faster than expected in the fourth quarter, helping full-year growth beat official estimates, as robust services and manufacturing helped counter the impact of tough US tariffs.】

item.title: 三菱以52亿美元收购美国Aethon天然气资产
item.description: 三菱商事同意以52亿美元收购Aethon能源管理公司的美国天然气及管道资产，这是日本企业在美页岩气领域最大规模的收购案。【原文：Mitsubishi Corp. agreed to buy Aethon Energy Management LLC’s US gas and pipeline assets for $5.2 billion, the biggest purchase by a Japanese company in the American shale sector.】

item.title: 伊朗无法指望TACO，因特朗普兑现威胁，英国《金融时报》称
item.description: 彭博经济研究显示，尽管美国总统特朗普暗示暂停对伊朗的攻击，但他在第二任期内兑现了更多威胁，这意味着伊朗面临的风险更高。【原文：Donald Trump is following through on a greater share of his threats in his second term, suggesting a higher risk for Iran even as the US president signals a pause in attacks on the country, a Bloomberg Economics report showed.】

item.title: 中国严打高频交易，金属价格下跌
item.description: 金属价格在动荡的一周结束时下跌，此前中国收紧高频交易监管。此举源于内地期货市场的狂热交易活动，该活动曾助推全球价格上涨。【原文：Metals fell at the end of a dramatic week, as China clamped down on high-frequency trading in a move that came after frenzied activity in mainland futures that helped to fuel global price gains.】

item.title: 全球公司债券收益率溢价降至2007年以来最低水平
item.description: 全球信贷市场的投资者正接受近二十年来最低的企业债务收益率溢价，这得益于经济前景的强劲韧性。【原文：Investors across global credit markets are accepting the lowest yield premiums on corporate debt in almost two decades, heartened by a resilient economic outlook.】

item.title: 印度投资者涌入金属股，白银、铜价飙升
item.description: 商品衍生品已成为散户交易者中的最新风潮。【原文：Commodity derivatives are the latest fad among retail traders.】
